data.title: America SVG free
data.meta_description: Get Patriotic with an AMERICA SVG free cut file! Make sweaters, signs, or a cute outdoor garden flag for the 4th of July and Memorial Day!
data.meta_site_name: A girl and a glue gun
data.text:
Get Patriotic with an AMERICA SVG free cut file! Make sweaters, signs, or even a cute outdoor garden flag for the 4th of July and Memorial Day!

I always find myself without a cute holiday sweater! And I love that I have all the supplies to whip one up last minute! This American Sweatshirt cut file is perfect to show off your red white and blue pride for the 4th of July or Memorial day!

If you are looking to sell products made with this cut file please purchase a commercial license HERE! (This will let you use ANY of the free cut files I offer on my blog! If you are having a crafting day and want to use this to whip up a cute sign or tote bag-then totally free! Every cut file is hand-lettered by me on my iPad pro with an iPad pencil. I have a WHOLE video on how I create my cut files HERE!

Supplies to make projects with this SVG cut file

Vinyl Projects:

This cut file can be used to decorate so many things! Here are a few of my favorites…

Banners

Tumblers

Mugs

Tote bags

Wood signs

Notebooks or folders

T-shirts

Aprons

Hats

Wood round Door hangers

Vases

Cards

Keychains

And more!

I have a list of all my favorite places to snag some blanks (and what blanks are!) and a post about my favorite t-shirts to put vinyl on!

I also have been adding fun things to this Amazon wish list

Electronic Cutting Machine:

All these svgs cut files are compatible with the Cricut software and Silhouette Cameo Studio. I have a silhouette cameo that I use almost daily and LOVE. If you are new to silhouette, I did create a whole Silhouette Love series! I just want everyone to love their silhouette as much as I love mine!

These are some of my favorite machines!

Silhouette cameo 4

Silhouette Cameo PRO (cuts 24 inches wide)

Cricut Maker

Vinyl:

I buy all of my vinyl from Expressions Vinyl. It’s the best quality and they have SO MANY options! Quality vinyl is SO important! I used the awesome Patriotic Ombre for this sweater (it came in the Expressions Vinyl mystery box! Best purchase ever!)

But you could do an ombre with different shades of red vinyl.

Or break it up to look like an American flag. I used blue polka-dotted patterned vinyl for this!

Make sure to check out their Machine and heat settings charts! They are so helpful to see at a glance what your blade depth or temperature needs to be at!

Heat transfer Vinyl for bags and shirts.

adhesive vinyl for mugs and signs.

Best Transfer Tape around!

and check out their patterned vinyl

Download your SVG Cut File

Sign up below to access this cut file and all my free cut files offered on my website! It’s well over 125 SVG cut files! If you are already a member, log in here!

If you do not see the form above, you can sign up here!

I have using adhesive vinyl and heat transfer vinyl for years! I’ve written up so many posts as I have come across problems! Here are some of my most asked questions that have come up!

How to layer adhesive vinyl

Why is my heat transfer vinyl peeling up?

How to remove heat transfer vinyl (if you spell something wrong or put it on crooked)

How to use transfer tape with adhesive vinyl

Using an iron with heat transfer vinyl

Washing instructions for Iron-on vinyl projects

How to cut vinyl decals bigger than your machine

Best way to weed vinyl

Is the Cricut Easypress worth it

Hope this list helps!

I also have lots of HUGE BUNDLES for a great price in my shop!

The most popular cut file in my shop? The create for your cutter lid!

If you make anything–I would LOVE LOVE LOVE To see it!
